1.name: American Gangster
1.description: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

2.name: No Country for Old Men
2.description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

3.name: Atonement
3.description: Fledgling writer Briony Tallis, as a thirteen-year-old, irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

4.name: Zodiac
4.description: In the late 1960s/early 1970s, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

5.name: Stardust
5.description: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

6.name: Transformers
6.description: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

7.name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
7.description: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

8.name: Hot Fuzz
8.description: A skilled London police officer is transferred to a small town with a dark secret.

9.name: There Will Be Blood
9.description: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

10.name: Superbad
10.description: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

11.name: Spider-Man 3
11.description: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

12.name: Gone Baby Gone
12.description: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

13.name: Into the Wild
13.description: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

14.name: Eastern Promises
14.description: A Russian teenager living in London who dies during childbirth leaves clues to a midwife in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

15.name: Sunshine
15.description: A team of international astronauts are sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying Sun with a nuclear fission bomb in 2057.

16.name: Hairspray
16.description: Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

17.name: Ratatouille
17.description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

18.name: The Mist
18.description: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

19.name: I Am Legend
19.description: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

20.name: Juno
20.description: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes an unusual decision regarding her unborn child.

21.name: Bridge to Terabithia
21.description: A preteen's life turns upside down when he befriends the new girl in school and they imagine a whole new fantasy world to escape reality.

22.name: Death Proof
22.description: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

23.name: Knocked Up
23.description: For fun-loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one-night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant with his child.

24.name: Beowulf
24.description: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel who is terrorizing Denmark, and later, Grendel's mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

25.name: Enchanted
25.description: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

26.name: An American Crime
26.description: The true story of suburban housewife Gertrude Baniszewski, who kept a teenage girl locked in the basement of her Indiana home during the 1960s.

27.name: Shooter
27.description: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the President. Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, he goes on the run to find the real killer and the reason he was set up.

28.name: P.S. I Love You
28.description: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

29.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
29.description: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

30.name: Becoming Jane
30.description: A biographical portrait of a pre-fame Jane Austen and her romance with a young Irishman.

31.name: Butterfly on a Wheel
31.description: A perfect family's dynamic is ruined by a kidnapper's brutally efficient plot.

32.name: 3:10 to Yuma
32.description: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

33.name: The Heartbreak Kid
33.description: A newly wed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon.

34.name: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
34.description: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, aka Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett.

35.name: Fracture
35.description: An attorney, intent on climbing the career ladder toward success, finds an unlikely opponent in a manipulative criminal he is trying to prosecute.

36.name: The Bourne Ultimatum
36.description: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

37.name: Ocean's Thirteen
37.description: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist, after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

38.name: Halloween
38.description: After being committed for 17 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution and immediately returns to Haddonfield to find his baby sister, Laurie.

39.name: The Golden Compass
39.description: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

40.name: Across the Universe
40.description: The music of The Beatles and the Vietnam War form the backdrop for the romance between an upper-class American girl and a poor Liverpudlian artist.

41.name: Live Free or Die Hard
41.description: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

42.name: Resident Evil: Extinction
42.description: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.

43.name: Funny Games
43.description: Two psychopathic young men take a family hostage in their cabin.

44.name: Bee Movie
44.description: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them.

45.name: Grindhouse
45.description: Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez's homage to exploitation double features in the 60s and 70s with two back-to-back cult films that include previews of coming attractions between them.

46.name: Lars and the Real Girl
46.description: A delusional young man strikes up an unconventional relationship with a doll he finds on the Internet.

47.name: 28 Weeks Later
47.description: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes according to plan.

48.name: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
48.description: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

49.name: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
49.description: Two straight, single Brooklyn firefighters pretend to be a gay couple in order to receive domestic partner benefits.

50.name: 30 Days of Night
50.description: After an Alaskan town is plunged into darkness for a month, it is attacked by a bloodthirsty gang of vampires.
